title: Moving charges - acceleration in E and B fields

content.question: A particle of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> and positive charge <math alttext="q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>q</mi></math> is moving to the right with speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> when it encounters a region containing uniform magnetic and electric fields. The fields are oriented as shown in the figure. Which of the following expressions correctly represents the magnitude of the initial acceleration of the particle the moment it enters the fields?

choices.label: <math alttext="open absolute value, the fraction with numerator q v B, and denominator m, close absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>v</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open absolute value, the fraction with numerator q E, and denominator m, close absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><mfrac><mrow><mi>q</mi><mi>E</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open absolute value, q times, the fraction with numerator v B minus E, and denominator m, close absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><mi>q</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>v</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>E</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open absolute value, q times, the fraction with numerator v B plus E, and denominator m, close absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><mi>q</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>v</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>E</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open absolute value, q times, the fraction with numerator v B minus E, and denominator m, close absolute value" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><mi>q</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>v</mi><mi>B</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>E</mi></mrow><mi>m</mi></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></mstyle></math>
